title: 820-00840 No Post
message: Hello. Got this board here. It's on S0 state, trackpad clicks and CPU gets hot. It pulls 550mA from charger but no post. I tried first disconnecting screen as the internal flex was poked by someone who claimed to have fixed it(?!?!?!). Tried on external display without internal screen connected but no POST. As I was getting VCORE I tried to flash new known working BIOS to it, but still same result. Suspecting maybe bad CPU. Any ideas?

title: 820-00840 No Post
message:
If the board was already worked in other service, you may waste time now.
There could be broken traces, knocked off components; even intentionally removed.

What is the exact CPU core voltage?
Did you check USB activity too?

title: 820-00840 No Post
message: No USB activity. L7210 is 0.972V and L7220 is 0.962V

title: 820-00840 No Post
message:
Then board is stuck, not booting.
CPU core should drop to 0.6V, when board really boots.

PLT_RESET_L comes high?

title: 820-00840 No Post
message:
Is better to return the machine.
It was probably damaged in the other service more than expected.

title: 820-00840 No Post
message: Understood. Your wish is an order sir LOL. Will return this crap to the owner. Thanks.
